abstract: Cloud computing is an Internet-based computing, where shared resources, software and information, are provided to computers and devices on-demand. To provide flexible communication and to satisfy the customers need cloud computing is preferred. Three types of services like Software as a Service (SAAS), Infrastructure as a Service (IAAS) and Platform as a Service (PAAS) offer transmitting our software and our confidential data in a secure manner. Advantages of clouds are data sharing, distribution, scalability, confidentiality, independency and less cost of software. Although advantages are useful some disadvantages also we need to face. To tackle those difficulties security and privacy in cloud computing are important.
meta: January 2014International Journal of Applied Engineering Research 9(24):27879-27893
